# Data process

## SHARE

### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `yrbirth` |
|----------|------------|
| **Label** | `year of birth` |
| **Table name** | `sharew1_rel2-6-0_cv_r_whitout_nointw1` |
| **Missings** | `-2 = refusal; -1 = don't know` |
| **Description** |  |


```{r assign1, echo=F}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'SHARE_w1_ybirth','SHARE.sharew1_rel2-6-0_cv_r_whitout_nointw1',
                         variables=list('yrbirth'), missings = TRUE)
SHARE_w1_ybirth <- opal.execute(o,'SHARE_w1_ybirth')
```

```{r local1, echo=F}
vari <- SHARE_w1_ybirth$yrbirth
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vari, missing_values = c(-2,-1))[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(-2,-1))[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(-2,-1))$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(SHARE_w1_ybirth, aes(yrbirth)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue",data = . %>% filter(!vari %in% c(-1,-2))) + xlab("Year of birth") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
The harmonized variable is the same of the study-specific variable but the missing values have to be recoded as follows:

* ` -2 "refusal" into 997`
* ` -1 "don't know" into 998`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1}
SHARE_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=SHARE_w1_ybirth$id)
SHARE_ds_w1$ybirth <- car::recode(SHARE_w1_ybirth$yrbirth, "-2=997; -1=998;  NA=999")
SHARE_ds_w1$ybirth <- labelled(SHARE_ds_w1$ybirth, labels = c("Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Does not answer"=995,  "Not attempt not done"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistics of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript1, echo=F}
vari <- SHARE_ds_w1$ybirth
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(SHARE_ds_w1, aes(ybirth)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue",data = . %>% filter(!vari %in% miss_values_vector)) + xlab("Year of birth") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation1, echo=F,results='asis'}
cat("There are 12 different values between the harmonized variable and the study-specific variable that correspond to the missing values:",sum(SHARE_w1_ybirth$yrbirth!=SHARE_ds_w1$ybirth))
```







```{r importOPAL1, echo=F}
label(SHARE_ds_w1$ybirth) <- ds_label
ybirth <- SHARE_ds_w1
save(ybirth, file = "../RData/w1/ybirth.RData")
#opal.assign.data(o, 'SHARE_ds_w1', SHARE_ds_w1)
#opal.symbol_import(o,'SHARE_ds_w1', project='_Athlos_Harm_Dataset')

SHARE_m_ds_w1 <- SHARE_ds_w1
SHARE_m_ds_w1$ybirth <- car::recode(SHARE_m_ds_w1$ybirth, "c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997,998, 999)=NA")
```

## Summary of descriptive statistics of the harmonised variable accross populations and waves





```{r summ, echo=F}

SHARE.cw <- list(w1 = "w1", w2 = "w2", w3 = "w3", w4 = "w4", w5 = "w5")

# Consider only harmonised waves
l.hds <- lapply(SHARE.cw, function(wname) if(exists(paste0("SHARE_ds_",wname))){wname = get(paste0("SHARE_ds_",wname))})
nullw <- which(sapply(l.hds, is.null))

if(length(nullw)!=0){
  l.hds <- l.hds[-nullw]
}

m.hds <- list()

# Labelling of the tibbles and creating new tibbles with all missings recodified as NA

for(name in names(l.hds)) {
  aux_object <- l.hds[[name]]
  label(l.hds[[name]][[2]]) <- label(aux_object[[2]]) <- ds_label
  l.hds[[name]][[2]] <- labelled(l.hds[[name]][[2]], labels = cont_label)
  aux_object[[2]] <- car::recode(aux_object[[2]], "miss_values_vector=NA")
  aux_object[[2]] <- labelled(aux_object[[2]], labels = cont_label)
  m_name <- paste0("SHARE_m_ds_",name)
  assign(m_name, aux_object)
  m.hds[[name]] <- get(paste0("SHARE_m_ds_",name))
  rm(aux_object)
}

t.summ <- summary(m.hds[[1]][2])[1:6]
t.hds <- substr(t.summ,1,regexpr(":", t.summ, fixed=T)-1)
t.hds <- c(substr(t.summ,1,regexpr(":", t.summ, fixed=T)-1),labels(Continuous_summary(l.hds[[1]][[2]],missing_values = miss_values_vector)$values_table)[[2]])
for (i in seq_along(l.hds)){
  t.summ <- summary(m.hds[[i]][2])[1:6]
  t.hds <- cbind(t.hds,c(as.numeric(substr(t.summ,regexpr(":", t.summ, fixed=T)+1,nchar(t.summ))),as.numeric(Continuous_summary(l.hds[[i]][[2]],missing_values = miss_values_vector)$values_table[1,])))
}
t.hds <- rbind(t.hds,c("sample size", sapply(l.hds,function(wave) length(wave[[1]]))))

dimnames(t.hds)[[2]] <- c(dimnames(summary(m.hds[[1]][2]))[[2]],toupper(names(l.hds)))
kable(t.hds,caption=ds_label)



```
